name: Diabetes
avoid_foods: sugar, sweetened beverages, white bread, pasta
recommended_foods: leafy greens, whole grains, lean proteins, nuts

name: Hypertension
avoid_foods: salty foods, processed meats, canned soups
recommended_foods: potassium-rich foods, low-fat dairy, whole grains, leafy greens

name: Heart Disease
avoid_foods: trans fats, red meat, fried foods, processed snacks
recommended_foods: omega-3 rich fish, berries, avocados, nuts, olive oil

name: Anemia
recommended_foods: iron-rich foods (red meat, legumes, spinach), vitamin C-rich foods (to enhance iron absorption)

name: Lactose Intolerance
recommended_foods: lactose-free milk, plant-based milk (almond, soy), fruits, vegetables

name: Obesity
avoid_foods: high-calorie foods, sugary drinks, fried foods
recommended_foods: low-calorie foods, fresh fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins

name: Celiac Disease
recommended_foods: gluten-free grains (rice, quinoa, corn), fruits, vegetables, lean proteins

name: Kidney Stones
recommended_foods: water, calcium-rich foods (cheese, yogurt), citrus fruits

name: Allergies
avoid_foods: allergic foods (nuts, shellfish, dairy, pollen, dust)

name: Thyroid
avoid_foods: soy products, cruciferous vegetables (broccoli, cauliflower, cabbage)
recommended_foods: iodine-rich foods (seafood, iodized salt), selenium-rich foods (brazil nuts), zinc-rich foods (pumpkin seeds)

name: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
avoid_foods: spicy foods, citrus, chocolate, caffeine, fried foods
recommended_foods: lean meats, whole grains, vegetables, oatmeal

name: Asthma
avoid_foods: sulfite-containing foods (wine, dried fruits), processed foods
recommended_foods: omega-3 rich foods (fish, flaxseeds), antioxidant-rich foods (fruits, vegetables)

name: Arthritis
avoid_foods: refined sugars, processed foods, fried foods
recommended_foods: anti-inflammatory foods (fish, olive oil, nuts, turmeric)

name: Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
recommended_foods: complex carbohydrates, lean proteins, vegetables, fruits

name: Gout
recommended_foods: low-purine foods (low-fat dairy, vegetables, whole grains, cherries)

name: Migraine
avoid_foods: aged cheese, processed meats, chocolate, alcohol
recommended_foods: fresh fruits (especially bananas), leafy greens, magnesium-rich foods (almonds, spinach)

name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
avoid_foods: high-fat foods, dairy, gluten, beans, cabbage
